Ti.Locale.currentLanguage() returns a combination of ISO 2-letter language and country codes instead of only 2 letters
fields.summary: iOS9: Ti.Locale.currentLanguage() returns a combination of ISO 2-letter language and country codes

comments.body: Hello, Seems  a valid bug. It returns both country code and language code. Ex: en-US. Thanks.
